gameDetails.name: Star Wars: The Card Game â€“ Promise of Power
gameDetails.description:
Throughout the "Alliances" cycle, you've been encouraged to forge new alliances across affiliations. Now, with Promise of Power, players find the final Force Pack of "Alliances", marking the climactic conclusion of the cycle. With ten new objective sets (two copies each of five distinct sets), this Force Pack continues to reward players of Star Wars: The Card Game for melding affiliations together in a single deck. Promise of Power also introduces plenty of characters from Star Wars Rebels, bringing a new version of Ezra Bridger, Cikatro Vizago, and more Inquisitors into the game.

—description from the publisher

Contains objective sets 285-289.
